evidence.claim: Syntrex AI operates within health-tech frameworks, confirming usage of FHIR and HIPAA compliant solutions.
Security and compliance measures for HIPAA mentioned on company security pages.
Their integration with EHRs aligns with health-tech standards, supporting interoperability and patient data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 or clearinghouse use cases on their site.
